main: ^Anak, eat your breakfast! You're going to school!
2nd: ^I can't bring you to school for a couple of days sweetie. Mama has to take care of your baby sibling and have work at home.
^I hope you understand son, soon I'll make up to you. Okay? Have a safe trip to school...

c-0: ^I promise! I love you! take care.
c-1: ^Thank you, baby. I love you! Take care.
